edu.utdallas.hadooprdf.accesscontrol
Class XPDP

java.lang.Object
  edu.utdallas.hadooprdf.accesscontrol.XPDP

public class XPDP
extends java.lang.Object

This is the policy decision point. The resource or file is provided along with the user name This code is modified from Sun's XACML implementation

Author:
Arindam Khaled

Constructor Summary

          Default constructor.

          Constructor that takes an array of filenames, each of which contains an XACML policy, and sets up a PDP with access to these policies only.

Constructor Detail

XPDP

public XPDP()
     throws java.lang.Exception
Default constructor. This creates a SimplePDP with a PDP based on the configuration defined by the runtime property com.sun.xcaml.PDPConfigFile.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

XPDP

public XPDP(java.lang.String[] policyFiles)
     throws java.lang.Exception
Constructor that takes an array of filenames, each of which contains an XACML policy, and sets up a PDP with access to these policies only. The PDP is configured programatically to have only a few specific modules.

Parameters:
policyFiles - an arry of filenames that specify policies
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
Method Detail

evaluate

public com.sun.xacml.ctx.ResponseCtx evaluate(java.lang.String requestFile)
                                       throws java.io.IOException,
                                              com.sun.xacml.ParsingException
Evaluates the given request and returns the Response that the PDP will hand back to the PEP.

Parameters:
requestFile - the name of a file that contains a Request
Returns:
the result of the evaluation
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is a problem accessing the file
com.sun.xacml.ParsingException - if the Request is invalid

run

public void run(java.lang.String XMLGroupFile,
                java.lang.String resource,
                XPDP pdp,
                java.lang.String user,
                boolean[] permit)
         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                java.net.URISyntaxException,
                java.lang.Exception
Parameters:
XMLGroupFile - : groups.xml
resource - : the requesting resource
pdp - : this
user - : the requesting user
permit - : The most important element. The permit[0] is set true when permit and permit[0] is set false when the access to resource is denied.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException
java.net.URISyntaxException
java.lang.Exception
